name: SPACE JAM SHOOTER 2.0!
description:
This is my new and improved 2d shooter project SPACE JAM 2.0!

modifications include

1) changed level 1 and level 3 backgrounds to make them each distinctively different from each other

2) added special planets and alien space ships in each level

3) changed each levels enemy to each be a different color for each different level, also changed the color of the buttons and backgrounds of menu screens 

4) changed the font and made the buttons bold and italicizes  

5) All three levels created

Credits 

created and improved by Sophia Greco
